sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: WITH relationship AS ( -- parent-child pairings for host taxa and all ancestors WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT taxon_id, ncbi_tax_id, parent_id FROM sres.taxon WHERE ncbi_tax_id IN (SELECT host_ncbi_tax_id FROM apidbTuning.PopsetAttributes) UNION SELECT sub.taxon_id, sub.ncbi_tax_id, sub.parent_id FROM sres.taxon sub, CTE WHERE cte.parent_id = sub.taxon_id ) SELECT DISTINCT taxon_id, ncbi_tax_id, parent_id FROM cte ORDER BY taxon_id, ncbi_tax_id, parent_id ) SELECT r.ncbi_tax_id AS term , r.ncbi_tax_id AS internal , pt.ncbi_tax_id AS parentterm , sci.name || CASE WHEN commons.name IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' (' || commons.name || ')' END AS display FROM relationship r INNER JOIN sres.taxonName sci ON r.taxon_id = sci.taxon_id LEFT JOIN sres.taxon pt ON r.parent_id = pt.taxon_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT taxon_id , string_agg(name, ' / ' ORDER BY name) AS name FROM sres.taxonName WHERE name_class = 'common name' GROUP BY taxon_id ) commons ON r.taxon_id = commons.taxon_id WHERE sci.name_class = 'scientific name' ORDER BY r.ncbi_tax_id, pt.ncbi_tax_id

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct curated_isolation_source AS term, curated_isolation_source AS internal FROM apidbTuning.popsetAttributes WHERE curated_isolation_source is NOT NULL ORDER BY lower(curated_isolation_source)

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT product AS display, replace(product, ',', '') as term, product as internal FROM (SELECT distinct ga.product FROM apidbtuning.GenePopsetOverlap gio, webready.GeneAttributes ga WHERE gio.gene_source_id = ga.source_id AND min_pvalue_exp<-5 AND ga.product IS NOT NULL AND NOT ga.product = ' ' ) t UNION SELECT 'N/A' AS display, 'N/A' AS term, 'N/A' AS internal

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct 'Genotype #' || v.prediction_number as display, v.prediction_number as term, v.prediction_number as internal FROM dots.popsetfeature v WHERE name = 'RFLP' AND v.prediction_number is not null ORDER BY v.prediction_number

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct apidb.alphanumeric_str(r.title) as term, apidb.alphanumeric_str(r.title) as display, r.title as internal FROM SRES.BIBLIOGRAPHICREFERENCE r , study.studybibref sbr , study.studylink sl , apidbtuning.popsetattributes pa WHERE r.title is not null AND r.bibliographic_reference_id = sbr.bibliographic_reference_id AND sbr.study_id = sl.study_id AND sl.protocol_app_node_id = pa.protocol_app_node_id ORDER BY r.title

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: with relationships as (select rel.subject_term_id, rel.predicate_term_id, rel.object_term_id from sres.ontologyrelationship rel, sres.externaldatabase d, sres.externaldatabaserelease r where r.external_database_release_id = rel.external_database_release_id and r.external_database_id = d.external_database_id and d.name = 'Ontology_gaz_RSRC'), country as (select t.ontology_term_id from sres.ontologyterm t, (select subject_term_id as ontology_term_id from relationships union select predicate_term_id from relationships union select object_term_id from relationships) r where t.ontology_term_id = r.ontology_term_id), continentalization as (select subject_term_id as country_id, object_term_id as continent_id from sres.OntologyRelationship where subject_term_id in (select ontology_term_id from country)) -- countries select countryTerm.source_id as term, countryTerm.name as display, countryTerm.name as internal, continentTerm.source_id as parentTerm from continentalization c, sres.OntologyTerm countryTerm, sres.OntologyTerm continentTerm where c.country_id = countryTerm.ontology_term_id and c.continent_id = continentTerm.ontology_term_id union -- continents select source_id as term, name as display, name as internal, null as parentTerm from sres.OntologyTerm where ontology_term_id in (select continent_id from continentalization) union select 'unknown' as term, 'Unknown' as display, 'unknown' as internal, null as parentTerm

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct initcap(src.continent) AS term, src.continent AS internal FROM ApiDB.Continents src WHERE src.continent is not null UNION SELECT '--None--' AS term, '0' AS internal

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: WITH innerT AS ( WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT t.taxon_id, t.parent_id FROM sres.taxon t WHERE taxon_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT tn.taxon_id FROM apidb.organism o, sres.taxonname tn WHERE family_name_for_files IS NOT NULL AND tn.name = o.family_name_for_files -- TODO: these can be removed when the workflow populates apidb.organism.family_name_for_files UNION SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxonname WHERE name = CASE WHEN '@PROJECT_ID@' = 'PlasmoDB' THEN 'Plasmodium' ELSE '' END ) UNION SELECT sub.taxon_id, sub.parent_id FROM sres.taxon sub, cte WHERE cte.taxon_id = sub.parent_id ) SELECT tn.name AS organism , pn.name AS parent FROM cte tree, sres.taxonname tn, sres.taxonname pn WHERE tree.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND tn.name_class = 'scientific name' AND tree.parent_id = pn.taxon_id AND pn.name_class = 'scientific name' AND NOT tn.name = pn.name ) SELECT DISTINCT regexp_replace(organism, '['']', '') as term, organism as internal, case when organism = 'environmental samples' then '' else regexp_replace(parent, '['']', '') end as parentTerm FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT organism, parent FROM innerT WHERE organism in (SELECT DISTINCT organism FROM apidbtuning.popsetattributes) UNION SELECT sub.organism, sub.parent FROM innerT sub, cte WHERE cte.parent = sub.organism ) SELECT * FROM cte ) t ORDER BY term
